Sentencas: A typical operating temperature of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is quite high above 750 degrees C and affects the thermomechanical behavior of the cell.
Titulo: A Numerical Investigation of the Thermal Stresses of a Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Thermal stresses may cause microstructural instability and sub-critical cracking.
Titulo: A Numerical Investigation of the Thermal Stresses of a Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Therefore, a joint analysis by the computational fluid dynamics (CFD) and computational structural mechanics based on the finite element method (FEM) was carried out to analyze thermal stresses in a planar SOFC and to predict potential failure locations in the cell.
Titulo: A Numerical Investigation of the Thermal Stresses of a Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: A full numerical model was based on the coupling of thermo-fluid model with the thermo-mechanical model.
Titulo: A Numerical Investigation of the Thermal Stresses of a Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Based on a temperature distribution from the thermo-fluid model, stress distribution including the von Mises stress, shear stress as well as the operating principal stress were derived in the thermo-mechanical model.
Titulo: A Numerical Investigation of the Thermal Stresses of a Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The FEM calculations were performed under different working conditions of the planar SOFC.
Titulo: A Numerical Investigation of the Thermal Stresses of a Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The highest total stress was noticed at the lower operating voltage of 0.3 V, while the lowest total stress was determined at the voltage of 0.7 V. The obtained stress distributions allowed a better understanding of details of internal processes occurring within the SOFC and provided helpful guidance in the optimization of a new SOFC design.
Titulo: A Numerical Investigation of the Thermal Stresses of a Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
